verses.roman:
ei ta' kahiluṅ prabhura samudra-patana
ihā yei śune, pāya caitanya-caraṇa

synonyms: ei ta'-thus; kahiluṅ—I have described; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; samudra-patana—the falling into the sea; ihā—this story; yei śune—anyone who hears; pāya—obtains; caitanya-caraṇa—shelter at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Thus I have described the incident of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's falling into the ocean. Anyone who listens to this pastime will certainly attain shelter at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
